structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-242.2. Non-vocal communications, etc.
Every person engaged in the business of owning or operating telegraph systems and any other non-vocal message communications such as cablegram, paging services (beeper), electronic mail, and facsimile transmission service shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, for each place of business to the Tax Collector.
